thread.title: PRIV named one of the most secure Android smartphones of 2016
thread.title_full: PRIV named one of the most secure Android smartphones of 2016

author: James Nieves
title: PRIV named one of the most secure Android smartphones of 2016
text:
Google's annual Android Security Review names PRIV one of the most secure smartphones of last year.

Google's annual Android Security Review names PRIV one of the most secure smartphones of last year. While rather unsurprising to most of us here, there are some areas of the report that BlackBerry's software efforts receive some substantial kudos.
Read More Â»
